Title: Let's Make a Movie
Writer: Chris Morcom (additional material), Chris Morcom (screenwriter), Elana A. Mugdan, Elana A. Mugdan, Jan Tallent (screenwriter)
Actors: Hallie York, Johnathan Fernandez, Brian Cheng, Eric James Eastman
Plot: Cassie Thompson, a film-school dropout, decides to make a movie in order to turn her dead-end life around.
